definition: to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign

sentences.english: During custody, relatives are not allowed to see the criminal.
sentences.chinese: 监押期间亲属是不能探望犯人的。

sentences.english: The criminal ran away during escort, because the men in charge of escorting breached their duty.
sentences.chinese: 在监押途中犯人逃跑了，这是押解人员的失职。

sentences.english: He is in judicial custody awaiting trial.
sentences.chinese: 目前他正遭到司法监押，等待受审。

definition: to detain/to take into custody/to imprison temporarily
to send under escort/to transport a detainee
to beat a prisoner (to obtain confessions)/to give sb the third degree/to torture
prisoner that awaits execution/convict sentenced to death/someone on death row
in custody/to keep sb in detention
to send away under escort (criminals, goods etc)
cart with cage, used to escort prisoner
